segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's go over some basic info first. Can you tell me your name and do you have a title you prefer, like Mr. or Ms.?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I’m uh, my name’s John, but uh, I usually go by Johnny. And, um, my last name is Smith. Yeah. So Johnny Smith. No, I don’t really use any title or anything like that, just Johnny, you know?
